1232:11: dharmavacanenāpi parāśrayatvād dharmasya dharmyāśrayasiddhau pratyāsatteḥ sādhyadharmiṇa eva siddhiriti cet |
1232:14: siddhe tadaṃśavyāptyā dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇi sattve punardharmiṇo vacanaṃ dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇa eva yo dharmaḥ sa heturiti niyamārthamāśaṃkyeta |
1232:15: dṛṣṭaṃ sajātīya eva sattvam ityavadhāraṇena sādhyābhāve siddhe'pi vyatireke sādhyābhāve asattvavacanam,
1232:16: tathehāpi tadaṃśavyāptivacanāt siddhe'pi dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇi sattve tatraiva bhāvaniyamārtha dharmivacanamāśaṃkyeta |
1232:17: tasmāt sāmarthyād arthapratītāvapi upacāramātrāt samānanirdeśāt pratipattigauravaṃ ca parihṛtaṃ bhavati |
1232:25: (1.4) tasya vyāptirhi vyāpakasya tatra bhāva eva |
1232:27: etena anvayo vyatireko vā pakṣadharmaśca yathāsvaṃ pramāṇena niścita uktaḥ |
1232:30: (1.5) tatra pakṣadharmasya sādhyadharmiṇi pratyakṣato'numānato vā prasiddhiḥ |
1232:33: sadhūmaṃ hi pradeśamarthāntaraviviktarūpamasādhāraṇātmanā dṛṣṭavataḥ smārtaṃ yathādṛṣṭabheda viṣayaṃ liṅgajñānamutpadyate |
1232:35: (1.6) tasmiṃstathābhūte darśanena dṛṣṭesati sa yena yenāsādhāraṇastadasādhāraṇatāṃ tato bhedamabhilapantī atadvayāvṛtiviṣayā smṛtirutpatrā pratyakṣabalena na pramāṇam |
1232:40: arthakriyārthī hi sarvaḥ prekṣāvān pramāṇamapramāṇaṃ vā'nveṣate |
1232:41: na ca sāmānyaṃ svalakṣaṇapratipatterūrdhvaṃ tatsāmarthyotpatravikalpavijñānagrāhyaṃ kāñcidarthakriyāmupakalpayati |
1232:45: na ca tatsvalakṣaṇagrahaṇottarakālabhāvino nīlavikalpasya viṣayeṇa nīlasādhyārthakriyā kriyate |
1232:46: (1.7) tasmāt anadhigatārthaviṣayaṃ pramāṇam ityapi anadhigate svalakṣaṇe iti viśeṣaṇīyam |
1232:47: adhigate tu svalakṣaṇe tatsāmarthyajanmā vikalpastadanukārī kāryatastadviṣayatvāt smṛtireva,
1232:53: tato'pi vikalpāt vastunyeva tadadhyavasāyena puruṣasya pravṛtteḥ |
1232:58: sādhāraṇe hi kārye na teṣāṃ sāmarthyabhedaḥ |
1232:67: satsu apyanyeṣu hetuṣu asyābhāve na bhavatīti yastadbhāve bhāvastadabhāve'bhāvaśca pratyakṣānupalambhasādhanaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ tasya siddhiḥ |
1232:68: kāryakāraṇabhāva eva hyarthāntarasya evaṃ syāt- yatra dhūmastatrāvaśyamagniriti,
1232:69: agnibhāva eva hi bhāvo dhūmasya tatkāryatvamiti |
1232:72: (1.9) vyatirekaniścayo'pi kāryasvabhāvahetvoḥ kāraṇavyāpakānupalabdhibhyāṃ dṛśyaviṣayābhyāṃ kāryakāraṇavyāpyavyāpakabhāvasiddhau satyāṃ sādhyābhāve'bhāvasiddhiruddiṣṭa viṣayasyābhāvopadarśane |
1232:74: anuddiṣṭaviṣayaṃ sādhyābhāve hetvabhāvakhyāpanaṃ pratibandhamātrasiddhau sidhyatīti na tatra vyatireka- sādhane anupalabdhyoḥ dṛśyaviṣayatāviśeṣaṇamapekṣyate |
1232:85: aparāparavyāvṛttibhedena dharmabhede satyapi vastutaḥ liṅgasvabhāva eva |
1232:86: hetusvabhāve sādhyadharme'nvayavyabhicārābhāvāt lakṣaṇe tanmātrānvayeneti viśeṣaṇaṃ paramatāpekṣam |
1232:88: tena ca viśeṣaṇena tathavidhasya atatsvabhāvatāṃ tasmin sādhye hetorvyabhicāraṃ cāha |
1232:92: yathā yat sat tat sarvaṃ kṣaṇikam |
1232:95: tathā, kṣaṇikatvābhāve sattvābhāvaḥ saṃśca śabda iti |
1232:97: (2.3) atra pakṣadharmasambandhavacanamātrasāmarthyādeva pratijñārthasya pratīteḥ na pratijñāyāḥ prayoga upadarśitaḥ |
1232:100: pradeśasthaṃ dhūmamupalabdhavataḥ tasyāgninā vyāpteḥ smaraṇe tatsāmarthyādeva agniratra iti pratijñārthapratītirbhavati |
1232:101: na ca tatra kaścit agniratreti asmai nivedayati |
1232:103: pramāṇamantareṇaivaṃ pratīteḥ nimittābhāvāt pratītau liṅgasya vaiyarthyam |
1232:104: svayamevākasmāt agniratreti vyavasthāpya tatpratipattaye paścālliṅgamanusaratīti ko'yaṃ pratipatteḥ kramaḥ?
1232:108: yadi pratītiranyathā na syāttadā sarvaṃ śobheta |
1232:109: tasmādeṣa svayaṃpratītau kenacid viṣayopasthāpakena vināpi pratiyan asmān kāryiṇo dṛṣṭvā parvabrāhmaṇa iva vyaktaṃ mūlyaṃ mṛgayate |
1232:110: asmadvacanādapi svayaṃ siddhameva liṅgamanusṛtya sādhyaṃ pratyetīti ko'nayoravasthayorviśeṣaḥ?
1232:111: dṛṣṭā ca pakṣadharmasambandhavacanamātrāt sādharmyavat - prayogādeḥ pratijñāvacanamantareṇāpi pratītiriti kastasyopayogaḥ?
1232:113: tatra svayaṃ prameyopadarśanena vināpi pratipadya paraṃ pratipādayatrapūrva kramamāśrayate iti kimatra kāraṇam?
1232:117: ḍiṇḍikarāgaṃ parityajyākṣiṇī nimīlya cintaya tāvat kimiyatā pratītiḥ syātra veti |
1232:120: (2.5) atra pūrvaṃ hetuḥ prayoktavyaḥ paścād dṛṣṭānta iti kramaniyamo'pi na kaścit |
1232:124: nahi atatsvabhāvasya bhāve ekāntenānyasya bhāvaḥ kṛtakatvasya bhāve prayatnānantarīyakatvavat |
1232:127: tasmādanvayavyatirekayoryathālakṣaṇameko'pi prayokto dvitīyamākṣipatīti naikatraṃ sādhanavākye dvayoḥ prayogaḥ iṣyate vaiyarthyāt |
1232:130: tadabhāva eva hetorabhāvakhyātiryathā syāt nānyatra vipakṣe viruddhe vā iti niyamakhyāpanārtho'pi vyatirekaprayogo na yuktaḥ ,
1232:132: (2.7) kathamidam avagamyate sadavaśyaṃ naśvarasvabhāvamiti yena anvayavyatirekasambhava iti cet |
1232:134: svabhāvata eva bhāvā naśvarāḥ naiṣāṃ svahetubhyo niṣpatrānāmanyato vināśotpattiḥ |
1232:136: na hi vināśaheturbhāvasya svabhāvameva karoti tasya svahetubhyo nirvṛtteḥ |
1232:142: bhāvapratiṣedhakaraṇe na tasya kiñcidbhavati na bhavatyeva kevalamiti |
1232:143: evaṃ ca kartā na bhavatītyakarturahetutvamiti na vināśahetuḥ kaścit |
1232:145: yadi svabhāvato naśvaraḥ svātmanyanavasthāyī bhāvaḥ tasya na kiñcinnāśakāraṇaiḥ |
1232:147: yo hi yatsvabhāvaḥ sa svahetoreva utpadyamānaḥ tādṛśo bhavati,
1232:150: na hi prakāśādayastadātmāna utpannāḥ punaḥ prakāśādibhāve hetvantaramapekṣante |
1232:152: tadvadasthitidharmā cet svabhāvato bhāvo niṣpanno na punastadātmatāyāṃ hetvantaramapekṣate |
1232:160: bhāvānāṃ svabhāvānyathātvābhāvāt tatsvabhāvasya paścādiva prāgāpi jananaprasaṅgāt |
1232:162: pūrvabhāvinastu avasthāviśeṣā aṅkurakāraṇasya kāraṇāni iti nānekāntaḥ |
1232:164: (2.10) yadi te'ntyāḥ samarthāḥ kiṃ na janayanti pratyekamiti |
1232:167: na vai bhāvānāṃ kācit prekṣāpūrvakāritā yataḥ ayamasmāsvanyatamo'pi samarthaḥ kimasmābhiḥ kartavyam ityālocyāpare nivarteran |
1232:170: te samarthāḥ kiṃ nāparāparaṃ janayantīti cet |
1232:171: na, tatraiva sāmarthyāt tasyaivaikasya janane samarthā nānyasyeti nāparāparajananam |
1232:172: (2.11) bhinnasvabhāvebhyaścakṣurādibhyaḥ sahakāribhya ekakāryotpattau na kāraṇabhedāt kāryabhedaḥ syāditi cet |
1232:175: yathā mṛtpiṇḍakulālasūtrā dibhyo bhavato ghaṭasya mṛtpiṇḍādamṛtsvabhāvebhyo vṛkṣādibhyo bhinnaḥ svabhāvaḥ kulālāttasyaiva mṛdātmanaḥ sataḥ saṃsthāviśeṣātmatayā tadanyebhyo bhinnaḥ sūtrāttasyaiva mṛtsaṃsthāna viśeṣātmanaḥ cakrādervibhaktaḥ svabhāvo bhavati |
1232:178: na ca tayoḥ śāktiviśeṣaviṣayabhede'pi tajjanitaviśeṣabhedasya kāryasya svabhāvena bhedaḥ mṛtsaṃsthānayoraparasparātmatayā saṃsthānamṛdrūpābhyāṃ tayorapratibhāsanaprasaṅgāt |
1232:179: (2.12) anyadeva saṃsthānaṃ guṇo mṛddravyāt tena bhinnasvabhāvaḥ kulālamṛtpiṇḍayorupayogaviśeṣa iti cet |
1232:181: api ca yadi saṃsthānaṃ bhinnaṃ mṛdaḥ kulālaḥ kiṃ na pṛthakkaroti?
1232:182: guṇasya dravyaparatantratvāt sa kathaṃ pṛthak kriyeta?
1232:188: anyathā mṛtpiṇḍasya svabhāvata eva tathāvidhasaṃsthānasambandhayogyatve vastuna eva prāgapi yogyatālakṣaṇā dharmatāstīti saṃsthānaviśeṣeṇa sambandhaḥ syāditi |
1232:189: evaṃ tarthi sā yogyatā mṛddravyasya kulālād bhavatīti nānayoḥ svabhāvabhedaḥ |
1232:191: asti tāvadekasvabhāvatve'pi ekasyānekapratyayopādheyaviśeṣateti kiṃ mṛtsaṃsthānayoḥ ekasvabhāvatvasādhanāya atinirbandhena |
1232:192: (2.13) tena sahakāriṇaḥ pratyayā naikopayogaviṣayāḥ kāryasyaikasvabhāvatve'pi vastuta iti yatheha kāraṇabhedo bhinnaviśeṣopayogāt naikakāryaḥ,
1232:194: tathā hi- samanantarapratyayādvijñānāccakṣurvijñānasya upalambhātmatā tasyaivopalambhātmanaḥ sataścakṣurindriyādrūpagrahaṇayogyatāpratiniyamaḥ viṣayāttattulyarūpateti abhinnatve'pi vastutaḥ kāryasya kāraṇānāṃ bhinnebhyaḥ svabhāvebhyo bhinnā eva viśeṣā bhvantīti na kāraṇabhede'pi abhedastatkāryaviśeṣasya |
1232:195: ta evaite kāraṇaśaktibhedā yathāsvaṃ prativiśiṣṭakāryajanane'vyavadheyaśaktitayā pratyupasthitāḥ kṣaṇikatvātsāmagrīkāryasya svabhāvasthityāśrayaityucyante |
1232:196: tathāhi tattebhyaḥ samastebhyaḥ upalambhātmakaṃ rūpagrahaṇaṃ pratiniyataṃ viṣayarūpaṃ ceti prativiśiṣṭasvabhāvamekameva jātam |
1232:197: (2.14) apratirodhaśaktikeṣu anantarakāryeṣu anādheyaviśeṣeṇu kṣaṇikeṣu pratyayeṣu parasparaṃ kaḥ sahakārārthaḥ?
1232:198: na vai sarvatrātiśayotpādanaṃ sahakriyā kā tarhi?
1232:203: tatra ca kṣaṇe ekasya svabhāvasyāvivekād viśeṣasya kartumaśakyatvāt,
1232:208: te samarthā eva svabhāvato'ntyāḥ pratyayāḥ saha jāyante kṣaṇikā yeṣāṃ prākpaścātpṛthagbhāvo nāsti,
1232:214: kadācidanyathā'pi syuḥ tataścaiko'pi kvacit janayed iti cet |
1232:215: aparāpara pratyayayogena pratikṣaṇaṃ bhinnaśaktayaḥ saṃskārāḥ santanvanto yadyapi kutaścitsāmyātsarūpāḥ pratīyante tathāpi bhitra evaiṣāṃ svabhāvaḥ |
1232:217: tatra yo'vyavadhanādideśo rūpendriyādikalāpaḥ sa vijñānajanane samartho hetuḥ |
1232:218: yasteṣāṃ parasparopasarpaṇādyāśrayaḥ pratyayaviśeṣaḥ sa taddhetujanane samarthaḥ teṣāṃ ca na pūrvaṃ na paścātra pṛthagbhāva iti samarthānapi pūrvāparapṛthagbhāvbhāvino doṣā nopalīyante |
1232:219: tena yasteṣāṃ parasparopasarpaṇādihetuḥ sa samarthasya heturiti tatra na kadācidanyathābhāvaḥ |
1232:220: (2.16) anena nyāyena sarvatra hetuphalabhāvapratiniyamo draṣṭavyaḥ pratikṣaṇamanyānyasvabhāvabhedānvayinīṣu śaktiṣu,
1232:223: anyasahitaḥ karoti na kevala iti cet |
1232:228: kuvindādayaḥ paṭādikriyāyāṃ samarthā api na sarvatra kurvantīti cet |
1232:229: krīḍanaśīlo devānāṃ priyaḥ sukhaidhitaḥ kṛtamapi punaḥ punaḥ kārayati,
1232:232: antyāvasthāyāṃ prāgasamarthasya sāmarthyotpattau tasya sāmarthyasya tatsvabhāvatve'pūrvotpattirevasā |
1232:233: atatsvabhāvatve saḥ akāraka eva sāmarthyākhyātpadārthāntarāt kāryotpattyabhyupagamāt |
1232:234: (2.17) api ca yo'sau sakaleṣu sahakāriṣu karoti sa tadaiva kasmāt karoti |
1232:236: aho mahāsāmarthyaṃ mahāprabhāvasya darśanaṃ yasmādatatsvabhāvān api bhāvān svabhāvamātreṇa nānāprakāreṣu vyāpāreṣu niyuṅkte |
1232:237: yadi nāma kiñcit kathañcidatrabhavato darśanaviṣayatām atikrāmet,
1232:238: hanta aprasavadharmakamapetasantānaṃ syaditīyaṃ cintā cittaṃ dunoti |
1232:239: na vai vayam atatsvabhāvānāṃ bhāvānām asmaddarśanavaśāt kāryakriyāṃ brūmaḥ kintu svabhāvenaiva te kāryakāraṇadharmāḥ ,
1232:240: tān paśyantaḥ kevalaṃ jānīmahe te ete kārakasvabhāvā iti |
1232:242: svabhāvasteṣāṃ kāryakriyādharmā tena samastapratyayānāmakṛtvā kāryaṃ nopekṣāpattiriti |
1232:243: so'kṣepakriyādharmā svabhāvaḥ kiṃ teṣāṃ tadaivāntyāvasthāyāmutpanna āhosvit prāgapyāsīt?
1232:245: tatkimidānīṃ mātā ca vandhyā ca asti?
1232:246: ko vāsya bhāṣitasyārthaḥ- akṣepakriyāsvabhāvaḥ kāryaṃ ca na karotīti |
1232:247: (2.19) sahitaḥ svakāryajananasvabhāvaḥ na kevala iti cet |
1232:250: na hi sa sāhitye'pi pararūpeṇa kartā syāt |
1232:251: svarūpaṃ ca tasya prāgapi tadeveti kathaṃ kadacit kriyāvirāmaḥ |
1232:252: yasyāpi bhāvah kṣaṇikaḥ tasyāpi kasmāt kevalo na karoti?
1232:258: yaśca bhavati sa eva na bhavatīti nāyaṃ prasaṅgaḥ kārakākārakayoḥ svabhāvataddhetvorvirodhāt |
1232:259: (2.20) yo'pi manyate- akṣepakriyādharmaiva sa tasya svabhāvaḥ,
1232:261: kāryaṃ tu pratyayāntarāpekṣamiti sahitebhya eva jāyate na kevalebhya iti,
1232:262: tasyāpi kathaṃ- sa bhāvaḥ kevalo'pi karotyeva?
1232:263: kāryaṃ ca tasmātrotpadyate iti tadavastho virodhaḥ |
1232:268: kāryaṃ cāyaṃ kevalo'pi samarthaḥ san paramapekṣamāṇaṃ kathamupekṣeta?
1232:270: evaṃ hi anenātmanaḥ sāmarthyaṃ darśitaṃ bhavati |
1232:271: kāryaṃ paramapekṣata iti tataḥ kevalād anutpattimasya kathayasi sa kevalo'pi samarthasvabhāva iti tataḥ utpattiṃ brūṣe,
1232:275: na tu akṣaṇikānāṃ yeṣāṃ pṛthagapi bhāvaḥ sambhavati pṛthak kāryakaraṇasambhavena sahakāritvaniyamāyogāt |
1232:276: (2.21) yatra tu santānopakāreṇa bhāvāḥ hetutāṃ pratipadyante,
1232:278: tatra santānāśrayeṇa viśeṣotpādanaṃ pratyayānāṃ sahakriyocyate na dravyāśrayeṇa,
1232:280: nahi taṇḍulādīnāṃ viśeṣānutpattau dahanādibhāve'pi odanajanma syāt |
1232:281: tathā prabhāsvarādapavarakaṃ praviṣṭasya yadīndriyaṃ svopakāribhyo'tiśayaṃ krameṇa na pratipadyeta tadā prāgivārthapratilpattiṃ naiva janayet |
1232:282: akṣepakāriṣu indriyādiṣu na viśeṣotpattiḥ parasparataḥ sambhavati |
1232:283: tatra yathāsvaṃ pratyayaiḥ parasparopasarpaṇādyāśrayairye yogyadeśādyavasthā jātāste saha svabhāvaniṣpattyā jñānahetutāṃ pratipadyante ityekārthakriyaiva sahakāritvam |
1232:284: (2.22) yatra tu viśeṣamutpādayantaḥ sahakāriṇaḥ pratyayāḥ tatra hetusantānaḥ pratyayāntarāṇyapekṣata iti tataḥ svabhāvāntarasya pratilambhaḥ |
1232:285: tatra svarasataḥ hetupratyayānāṃ pūrvopanipātakṣaṇānāṃ nivṛttau tebhya eva viśiṣṭakṣaṇotpattirevaṃ krameṇa yāvadatyantātiśayavato'ntyakāraṇakalāpāt kāryotpattiḥ |
1232:288: tataśca parasparaviśeṣotpādānapekṣiṇa eva sahakāriṇaḥ kāryaṃ kurvīran |
1232:293: na ca sahakāriṇaḥ parasparakāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣotpādane nityaṃ yogyāvasthāḥ,
1232:296: tenādyo viśeṣaḥ sahakāribhyo nirupakārasya notpadyata iti cet |
1232:297: nāsmākaṃ punaḥ punarabhidhāne'pi kaścidudvego bhavati yadyevamapi lokasya nyāyapratītirbhavati |
1232:299: na viśeṣotpādanāt sahakāriṇāṃ sahakāritvaṃ paramārthataḥ sambhavati |
1232:301: (2.24) atha kathamekārthakriyā'pi bhavet sāpi na bhavet parasparato viśeṣarahitānām |
1232:304: tathāca, tasmād viśeṣād bhavanaśīlaṃ kāryamapi kevalāt syāditi cet |
1232:305: atroktamuttaraṃ pratikṣaṇamaparāparaiḥ pratyayaiḥ yathā bhāvasantāne viśeṣasyotpattiḥ,
1232:310: kāryadvaividhyaṃ ca sahakāribhiḥ akṣepakārindriyavijñānavacca kāryakāraṇayoḥ svabhāvabhedāditi sarvamuktam |
1232:311: ( 2.25) tatra sahakāribhyaḥ santānopakārāpekṣakāraṇakāryajanmani sahakāriṇāmādyo viśeṣaḥ sahakārikṛtaviśeṣajanmā na bhavati,
1232:313: tataḥ ye viśeṣā jāyante te tajjanmānaḥ tatprakṛtitvāditi nānavasthā |
1232:317: tadā pṛthagbhāvasya sambhavātkevalo'pi tathā syād ityuktam |
1232:319: tasmādakṣaṇikānāṃ kāraṇānām ekārthakriyayā na kaścit sahakāritvaniyamaḥ |
1232:320: nāpi santatyopakāreṇeti na tasya kaścitsahakārīti kevalo'pi kuryāt |

1232:637: tasmāt pratibandhasādhakapramāṇavṛttyaiva bhāvābhāvau sidhyata iti vipratipattinirāsārthamasmābhirniścitagrahaṇaṃ kṛtam |
1232:646: ekaṃ vākyamubhayaṃ gamayatītyucyate naiko'rthaḥ svabhāvo dvitīyasyeti |
1232:647: nanu tatraiva bhāva ityatra tadarthatayā tadabhāve'bhāvo gamyate,
1232:648: atadbhāve'vaśyamabhāva ityatra ca tadbhāve bhāva iti parasparākṣepa iti cet |
1232:654: (5.15) tasmāt tatraiva bhāva iti na bhāva evocyate itareṇāpi nā bhāva eva yena bhāvo'bhāvo vā dvitīyamākṣipet |
